resources.name: create
resources.description: Create an ACD chat conversation from an external customer.

resources.name: get
resources.description: Get a media request in the conversation

resources.name: update
resources.description: Update a media request in the conversation, setting the state to ACCEPTED/DECLINED/ERRORED

resources.name: list
resources.description: Get all media requests to the guest in the conversation

resources.name: create
resources.description: Send a message in a chat conversation.

resources.name: create
resources.description: Send a typing-indicator in a chat conversation.

resources.name: get
resources.description: Get a web chat conversation member

resources.name: delete
resources.description: Remove a member from a chat conversation

resources.name: list
resources.description: Get the members of a chat conversation.

resources.name: get
resources.description: Get a web chat conversation message

resources.name: list
resources.description: Get the messages of a chat conversation.
